name: The Adventures of Cherria
description:
Cherria's town has been attacked by broccoli!

They destroyed everything and took all the villagers. It's now up to Cherria to stop the evildoers and save her family! Play through Stage 1 to help!

This is a 2d platformer game full of secrets and an interesting story. But don't be fooled by the cute smile of the main protagonist, the game is actually hard.  You will have to put your patience and skill to the test to help defeat the broccoli and find out who is behind all of this.

This is our first game, so feel free to leave suggestions on how we could improve. Thank you for all the support!
